title: Re: The Forumer you hate
content:
I'm not in the list... but why? Don't I spam needlessly throughout the entire PCKF? Don't I include thousands of unnecessary emotikeens in posts? Don't I always misspell simple words such as "the" and "unconventional"? Don't I make such cruel remarks that the unfortunate soul on the receiving end runs home to his/her mommy? Am I not so sarcastic that no one in the universe can tell whether I am being serious or not? Am I not one who deserves to be on this list?

Well, I cast my vote. First one! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] -----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/5541/newteaserdarker1xh.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"
